title: *Top Floor, Spacious Studio Apt w/Private Roofdeck Terrace* 88 8E
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We are the exclusive brokers for this building', '*BRAND NEW LUXURY CONSTRUCTION* / Lots of Layouts are Available - 1, 2, and 3 Bedroom Apartments / Some with Backyards & Private Roofdeck Terraces /', '*Top Floor, Spacious & Bright Studio Apartment w/Private Roofdeck Terrace*', 'The pictures are showing the actual available unit - I took them myself', '$2,950 Gross + 1.5 months free ($2,581 Net)', '*The Apartment Features:*', 'Spacious & Sunny Living Space that Can Accommodate a Full Set of Living Room Furniture & Bedroom Furniture / Bathroom with a Deep Soaking Tub & Rain Shower Head / AC Units / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Great Direct Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Ample Closet Space / Open Concept Kitchen with Brand New Full-Size Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / *Washer & Dryer in Unit* / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Furnished Roofdeck / Gym / Co-working Space / Lounge / Parking Garage* / Bike Racks / Package Room / Elevators /', 'A Short walk to *Prospect Park* /', 'A Step Away from the 2 & 5 at Trains at Church Ave Station /', 'A Short walk to the B & Q Trains at Parkside Ave Station /', '*Good credit history of 700+ and a combined annual income of $118,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
